12char: ( Must contain 12 characters, lowercase, uppercase, numbers, and special characters )

healthCheck.title: Health Check Disclosure
healthCheck.text1: This is a rough guildeline and basic recommendations for hardware requirements to run a beacon node. These requirements are set for a beacon node only.
healthCheck.text2: Beacon Node requires a dedicated Execution client and system requirements are not accounted for running the execution clients on the same machine. Additional resources may be required.
healthCheck.recommended: The recommend resources for a running a beacon node are:
healthCheck.item1: A multi-core CPU with at least 1GHZ speed

nodeSync.title: Sync Disclosure
nodeSync.text1: A Validator Client can only participate in the network once connected to a fully synced Lighthouse Beacon Node and subsequent Execution Client.
nodeSync.text2: It is recommended to wait until both of these clients have fully downloaded the chain history and are showing the "synced" status. It is however possible to view out-of-date validator metrics whilst the nodes sync and it is therefore safe to progress from this screen.

validator.title: Validator Returns Disclosure
validator.text1: The returns of a validator are based on the local performance of the node, the network as a whole and also the current active validators on the network.
validator.text2: Therefore predictions of future return in this application should be taken as a rough guide as these factors cannot be predicted in advance.

exitValidator.title: Validator Exit Disclosure
exitValidator.text1: A validator cannot rejoin the network once it voluntarily exits.
exitValidator.text2: We advise you to proceed with caution when completing the voluntary exit action, as it is a serious matter that may not be undone.

lighthouseVersionError: Lighthouse version {{major}}.{{minor}}.{{patch}} is required. Please update dependency and retry.

accountEarnings.balanceTooltip: The displayed balance is the accumulated validator rewards and does not include any balance withdrawn during reward payments.

toolTips.peerCount: The number of peers connected to the beacon node
toolTips.vcTime: The time that validator client has been running
toolTips.bnTime: The time that the beacon node has been running
toolTips.slotBehind: Number of slots the beacon node is behind. This indicates if the beacon node is at the head of the chain
toolTips.participation: The percentage of active validators that performed their duties last epoch.

nodeSync.syncWarning: You are currently syncing to the Ethereum Geth and Beacon node. This may take a while...

vcHealthCheck.title: Validator Health Check
vcHealthCheck.hasDiskSpace: Disk has the required 240GB for the full sync.
vcHealthCheck.noDiskSpace: Disk does not have the required 240GB for the full sync.
vcHealthCheck.checkLowRam: Please ensure your RAM is sufficient prior to start validating.

initScreen.connectingBeacon: Attempting to connect to Beacon Node
initScreen.connectingValidator: Attempting to connect to Validator Client

configScreen.advanceSettingsToolTip: Setup configuration settings for nodes using different protocols or IP addresses
configScreen.autoConnectToolTip: Store device data in local storage and allow device to connect automatically.
configScreen.apiTokenToolTip: This is the token emitted by the validator client. Its located by default at: ~/.lighthouse/<network>/validators/api-token.txt

protocolInput.ipBnToolTip: The IP address of the beacon node
protocolInput.ipVCToolTip: The IP address of the validator client
protocolInput.httpToolTip: The type of transport, http is default
protocolInput.bNPortToolTip: The port number of the Beacon Node HTTP API (5052 default). Beacon node should be configured with the --http or --gui flag
protocolInput.vCPortToolTip: The port number of the Validator Client HTTP API (5062 default).

success.validatorExit: Validator exit submitted successfully. Kindly wait while exit is being processed.
success.blsExecution: BLS Change Execution submitted. Kindly wait while the execution is being processed.

sessionAuth.length: Password must be at least 12 characters
sessionAuth.lowercaseRequired: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
sessionAuth.uppercaseRequired: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
sessionAuth.numberRequired: Password must contain at least one number
sessionAuth.specialCharRequired: Password must contain at least one special character

error.invalidJson: Invalid JSON data. Please ensure to use correct format.
error.executionFailure: Execution broadcast failed. Please ensure all fields and signature are valid.
error.networkError: {{type}} NODE NETWORK ERROR: Make sure your IP is correct and/or CORS is correctly configured. Use --http-allow-origin "*" in {{type}} config
error.beaconDataRequired: Beacon Node requires protocol, address and port
error.validatorDataRequired: Validator Node requires protocol, address and port
error.unableToSignExit: Unable to sign voluntary exit message

effectiveness.overallTargetDescription: Average accuracy of all validator finality votes indicating what the validators see as the first block in the current epoch
effectiveness.overallHeadHitDescription: Average accuracy of all validator votes of the block the validator sees at the head of the chain
effectiveness.targetDescription: Average accuracy of selected validator finality votes indicating what the validators see as the first block in the current epoch
effectiveness.headHitDescription: Average accuracy of selected validator votes of the block the validator sees at the head of the chain

tooltip.ethEstimate: Estimated {{time}} ETH earnings of all validators under current network and device conditions.
tooltip.ethTotal: Total ETH earnings of all validators
tooltip.fiatEstimate: Estimated {{time}} earnings converted to selected fiat currency exchange rate.
tooltip.fiatTotal: Total earnings converted to selected fiat currency exchange rate.
tooltip.annualApr: Combined total Annual Percentage Rate estimate.

networkErrorModal.title: Network Error
networkErrorModal.affectedNetworks: Siren failed to maintain connection to the designated <0>{{network}}</0>.
networkErrorModal.reconfigureOrContact: Please review and update configuration settings. If this issue persists please contact our team in <0>discord</0>.

sessionConfiguration.title: Session Authentication
sessionConfiguration.description: Protect your account with an optional session password. This extra layer of security ensures that only you have access to your account, even if someone gains access to your device. If no password is set, Siren will automatically default back to the api-token you set in your configuration settings.

sessionAuthModal.title: Session Authentication
sessionAuthModal.passwordPrompt: To ensure the safety of your account, password authentication is required to complete this action. Please confirm your password to proceed. Please be aware that you have a maximum of three attempts.
sessionAuthModal.failedResponse: Authentication failed. Please return to the configuration settings to re-enter your validator credentials.

blsExecution.tooltip: Validator requires BLS to Execution address conversion

warning.text: This validator is using old BLS withdrawal credentials. It will not receive regular partial withdrawals and cannot be exited. Please convert the withdrawal address to an execution address.
warning.learnMore: Learn more about BLS to Execution here.
warning.processingText: The BLS execution change has been processed but may take some time to be executed by the beacon node. Kindly wait until the validator status reflects the changes. Thank you for your understanding.

modal.title: BLS to Execution Change
modal.subTitle: Validator <0></0> Update
modal.description: Please enter your BLS Change JSON. Submitting this request will allow the beacon node to voluntarily deposit partial rewards and execute validator exits to a designated withdrawal address. This action is sensitive, please exercise caution and ensure that you have access to your withdrawal address before proceeding.
modal.followLink: For additional information, please follow the <0>link</0>.

validatorExit.warning: This action is irreversible and will cause your validator to get locked in to exited state pending withdrawal without the ability to start validator again. This action may take time, kindly wait until the validator status reflects the changes.
validatorExit.learnMore: Learn more about validator states in various phases here.

tooltips.beaconCritical: Hourly rate of critical level beacon logs

tooltips.validatorError: Hourly rate of error level validator logs
tooltips.beaconError: Hourly rate of error level beacon logs

tooltips.validatorWarning: Hourly rate of warning level validator logs
tooltips.beaconWarning: Hourly rate of warning level beacon logs
